issue.title: [CF 371] Can't see any icons at all
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Just logging in. If you type /tmw nothing happens, yet no error is generated.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect to see icons for my groups. I also expect when I type /tmw that I should be able to move the groups around and edit them.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.6.7

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no errors seem to be reported

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I'm having a problem where I can't see any of my icons at all. I had taken a hiatus from WoW for a while and then came back with patch 4.3. I've updated TMW to the latest (4.6.7). I did notice that the addon still shows up as out of date in the WoW addons list (but I told it to load out of date ones anyway). Typing /tmw doesn't do anything (there's no error though). I can fiddle around in the options, however


> Posted by CurseForge user Architekt | Imported from CurseForge issue #371 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Architekt
